name: Poson
tagline: Lighting/electronics based system powered by Arduino, Android and IdeamartLK, developed for the sacred Poson celebrations.
body:
### Welcome to Poson
Lighting/electronics based system powered by Arduino, Android and IdeamartLK, developed for the sacred Poson celebrations.

```
$ git clone https://github.com/CarbonwareLK/Poson
```

### Authors and Contributors
1. Tharaka Nandakumara
2. Harsha Siriwardena

### Support or Contact
Create a ticket [here](https://github.com/CarbonwareLK/Poson/issues/new) and weâ€™ll get back to you asap.
